description: Convert natural language to SQL queries using JigsawStack AI

inputs.name: api_key
inputs.info: Your JigsawStack API key for authentication

inputs.name: prompt
inputs.info: Natural language description of the SQL query you want to generate

inputs.name: sql_schema
inputs.info: The database schema information. Can be a CREATE TABLE statement or schema description. Specifying this parameter improves SQL generation accuracy by applying database-specific syntax and optimizations.

inputs.name: file_store_key
inputs.info: The key used to store the database schema on Jigsawstack file Storage. Not required if sql_schema is specified.
